provider.description: Reads feature tables from a GeoPackage file
provider.name: GeoPackage Schema

provider.description: Reads features from a GeoPackage file
provider.name: GeoPackage Features

provider.description: Writes instances to a GeoPackage file
provider.name: GeoPackage file

providerParameter.description: Allows to provide a WHERE clause filter for tables in the GeoPackage. One WHERE clause per table can be defined. The syntax is "<table name 1>|<WHERE clause 1||<table name 2>|<WHERE clause 2>||..."
providerParameter.label: Filters for querying the GeoPackage database
providerParameter.name: queryFilter

providerParameter.description: Target coordinate reference system the data should be transformed to (only applies if the schema does not specify the CRS already).
providerParameter.label: Target CRS
providerParameter.name: crs

valueDescriptor.defaultDescription: By default no CRS transformation is performed, the existing geometries are written with their respective CRS.
valueDescriptor.sampleDescription: Reference systems can be defined either as code or WKT (preceded with code: or wkt: respectively)

providerParameter.description: Type of spatial index to use when new tables are created in the target GeoPackage file
providerParameter.label: Type of spatial index
providerParameter.name: spatialindex.type

valueDescriptor.defaultDescription: By default, an RTree Spatial Index is created
